MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA23 postcode area of Portencross. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:33pm due to a fault on our underground cable network at Yonderfield Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:17pm on Monday, 15 February 2021
